text: A blindfold is a piece of cloth tied over a person's eyes. Sometimes a blindfold is made of material other than cloth. Blindfolds make it impossible to see. They are used for many different reasons: *To cover the eyes of a person who is blind. *They are used in some games played by children on a playground. *As sleep masks to help a person sleep when there is too much light. *In a ransom so that a person cannot see the kidnappers. *In magic tricks. *For erotic play. In art, Justice is sometimes made to look like a woman wearing a blindfold. ==Related pages== *Eyeglasses *Mask Category:Headgear Category:Eye
